@graph.name: Ossocubo
@graph.description: a small game development team from Switzerland and Italy.

jetpack-related-posts.title: New artwork!
jetpack-related-posts.author: Francesco Pirini
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I finally read Hellboy and i really liked the super expressive way Mignola uses black and white . Then i started to draw and came up with this random artwork!

jetpack-related-posts.title: First Post
jetpack-related-posts.author: Luca
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi folks and welcome to Ossocubo’s devlog! Yay! You know, we have been thinking for a while about whether or not to open a devlog. We were all concerned about the actual amount of interesting things to say or the quality of the material to show, but since the development…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Habemus composer!
jetpack-related-posts.author: Luca
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We have a composer for Blue Volta. After a long search for someone who would share our vision on Blue Volta, we can finally say that we found the right musician for the project. So we officially welcome aboard Paolo Giacci, talented composer made in Abruzzo. https://www.paologiacci.com https://soundcloud.com/paolo-giacci/sets/spotlight Paolo is…

jetpack-related-posts.title: So… what’s the plan?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Luca
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Until a couple of months ago, the search for a publisher was not a priority for us. At first, Blue Volta was a project to express our strengths and skills, which we worked on in our spare time. As time has passed, Blue Volta has grown in shape and size,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Blue Volta is dead, long live Blue Volta!
jetpack-related-posts.author: Luca
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We knew that developing a game would not be easy, and that looking for someone to finance a classic point and click graphic adventure in 2017 would have made us sweat a lot. However, something happened that forced us to slow down and re-evaluate the project overall: life. Read more…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dafne’s house wasn’t built in a day
jetpack-related-posts.author: Francesco Pirini
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Blue Volta has changed its face and little by little we are reviewing all the environments to adapt them to the new gaming style. The main difference on a visual level is that we have slightly changed the point of view, making it more similar to a classic platformer: with…
